0.1.2 (2023-07-08)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
**Minor Improvements**

- Add a ``aws-glue-artifact.txt`` to the Glue Python library zip file to ensure that it is a folder.


0.1.1 (2023-07-07)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
**Features and Improvements**

- First release.
- Add the following public API:

    - ``aws_glue_artifact.api.GluePythonLibArtifact``
